sentences.en: A residue can build up on the hair shaft, leaving the hair limp and dull looking.
sentences.cn: 残留物会积聚在头发上，使头发看起来软塌塌的，而且毫无光泽。

sentences.en: He carried her limp body into the room and laid her on the bed.
sentences.cn: 他把绵软无力的她抱进房间，放在床上。

sentences.en: He gave her a limp, cold handshake.
sentences.cn: 他有气无力且冷淡地与她握了一下手.

sentences.en: He had to limp off with a leg injury.
sentences.cn: 他腿上有伤，离开时只能一瘸一拐地走。

sentences.en: He hit his head against a rock and went limp.
sentences.cn: 他的头撞到一块岩石上，身子软了下来。

sentences.en: He took Melanie's limp body from Archie's arms with ease.
sentences.cn: 瑞德毫不费力地把媚兰纤弱的身子从阿尔奇怀里接过来.

sentences.en: He walked with a pronounced limp.
His arms were limp at his sides.
sentences.cn: 他的双臂无力地垂在身体两侧。

sentences.en: His hand went limp and the knife clattered to the ground.
sentences.cn: 他的手一软，刀子当啷一声掉到地上。

sentences.en: His limp is the result of a fall.
I picked up her wrist. It was limp and flaccid.
sentences.cn: 我抓起她绵软无力的手腕。

sentences.en: I wasn't badly hurt, but I injured my thigh and had to limp.
sentences.cn: 我伤得不重，但一条大腿伤到了，只好一瘸一拐地走。

sentences.en: Moreno limped off the field with a foot injury.
sentences.cn: 莫雷诺脚上受了伤，一瘸一拐地走出球场。

sentences.en: She was told to reject applicants with limp handshakes.
sentences.cn: 她被告知要回绝掉那些握手软弱无力的申请者。

sentences.en: The sandwiches came with a rather limp salad garnish.
sentences.cn: 三明治配着蔫软的色拉饰菜.

sentences.en: Young walked with a slight limp.

words.tran_cn: 柔软地；四肢无力地，软绵绵地
跛行，一拐一拐地走；缓慢费力地前进

trans.tran_cn: 无力的，无生气的，易弯的，松软的
跛行，挣扎着慢慢前进，（诗的）韵律紊乱
trans.tran_en: the way someone walks when they are limping

trans.tran_cn: 〔因一腿受伤而〕跛行，一瘸一拐地走
trans.tran_en: to walk slowly and with difficulty because one leg is hurt or injured

trans.tran_cn: 一瘸一拐地走，困难地航行
trans.tran_en: to walk slowly and with difficulty because one leg is hurt or injured
to walk slowly and with difficulty because one leg is hurt or injured
